messages.content: Thanks

mr ryan still plans to remain as the main advisor for wsps, so mr callahan would only be taking mr johnsons minimal role (which would only be slightly expanded) as such i wouldnt expect too many changes
i did not know that, but i did know that there were gonna be some advisor changes, including the retirement of mrs brann and the replacement of mr johnson as faculty advisor
Hey Landon, I have heard, and I am not sure if you are aware, but apparently Mr. Callahan is taking over WSPS. Did you know this? I am still trying to figure out if this is true. Thanks!
Thanks

hope youâre having a great summer too! i really appreciate your enthusiasm but i would recommend against contacting mr. ryan. heâs quite busy and will definitely be happy to speak with you in person next year. as for the board, iâm sure ellis will make decisions and notify you relatively early in the fall. donât hesitate to reach out with any more questions

Hi, I hope you are having a great summer. Would you be able to give me Mr. Ryan's email, so that I can begin contacting him? Also, do you have any idea when I will know if I was admitted to the WSPS board? Thanks Landon!
Thanks for everything you have done to help me on the Pelican, Mock trial, and WSPS
Actually nvm, I'll just contact him as soon as I get his info
Thanks, let my know if I get selected so that I can begin talking with Ellis
theres no such thing as junior head but he will appoint a board and i have suggested you for membership
yeah ellis is coming back from sya
Also, what is the plan for WSPS leadership next year. I know that there is a guy coming back from SYA who will be head, but would I be able to be a junior head?
Could Caleb and I do a 10 or 15 minute radio show recapping the top stories from the past week or two
I am very interested in having a senior position at WSPS. Thank you so much for the opportunity

basically the only purpose of the meeting was gonna be me suggesting you get fast tracked for future board positions (either next year or beyond) because of your commitment to the station. if youâre interested let me know and i can email mr ryan
unfortunately i dont think mr ryan can make it so i think we should just cancel
thanks for letting me know
Lunch tomorrow works for me
Khuan-Yu: ó°
great i'll see you then
Sure
mr ryan is leaving for a trip on friday does next tuesday work for our meeting?
sure
Could I start a brief maybe 15-20 min show where I discuss issues not discussed by the media
Thanks!
great! iâll see you then
Sure, sounds great!
friday?
I'm in StudCo, so monday lunch is not great. Any other day would work.
does monday work?
Because Mr. Ryan can't come should we still meet or just plan for next week instead
That meeting time works for me, although I may be 5 minutes late, as I have class B block
Sure
Could Caleb, Rex, and I do a current events show? We will probably discuss nuclear deal stuff, Cohen, and anything else we find
Perfect!
sure. we're gonna be meeting at 12:10p in the middle dinning room at one of the tables near the left side
As we get closer to Friday, would you be able to give me time and place info, regarding our lunch meeting?
thanks!
Oh, and Happ birthday
Sure, that would be great!
ive been really impressed in general with your work on the station this year. would you be interested in meeting with mr ryan and myself at lunch next friday?
for sure
If there is anything I can do to help just let me know
On it, thanks!

definitely! ive actually been trying to do the same thing this year. i think playing it in hargate would be great and ive actually been talking w mr ryan to make that happen. aside from that mostly chapel announcements and talking abt it to as many ppl as possible

Hi! One issue with the radio that I have begun recognizing is that most of the students here don't know that we even have a radio show. I was thinking of trying to play it in Hargate or install radios in dorms, basically any and all methods to spread WSPS on campus. Do you have any ideas, regarding how I should put my plans into action?
yeah sure sorry just saw this
Can Rex, Caleb, and I*
Can I Rex, Caleb, and I do a live show now? We will discuss Muller, North Korea, Trade, and anything else we find on NYT, Washington Post, and other paper front pages
Thank you so much
yeah and he can show you everything so you dont need to get trained
I told him to. Did he come?
Rex is on his way right?
great thanks
Rex can come to the studio at 730
ok lmk if thats possible asap
thanks
Maybe, but because of music tuesdaysand thurdays are difficult. I'll try to get out of it, and send Rex if I can't.
how does tuesday at 730 work for training?
Thanks
Okay, let me know when you are doing the training
Cant show you until youre trained but after that im happy to
Sorry had to reschedule the train to a different day
Or, would we be able to meet so that you can show me how to send recorded shows out onto the air
I do not have debate. Have you guys already done the training
Okay, thanks!
Unfortunately the only person certified to give the training is a professional from off campus who comes in
Okay, I'll see if I can change anything. However, if not would you be able to tell me who is being trained so that they can show me at a different time?
If its possible to rearrange thatd be really helpful since there are several other people getting trained at 7:30 tomorrow
Yeah, but I have no sports tomorrow, so I can meet at anytime before then
Do you know whether you actually will have debate at 730 tomorrow?
Khuan-Yu: ó°
maybe iâll let you know
I might have debate what about 6:30
thanks!
i have arrange a meeting this wednesday at 7:30 does that work?
Haha, no problem. Have fun
sorry im visiting college rn
We just recorded instead. It is about 40 min. Could you tell me when the show will go live. Thanks
Would we be able to meet tomorrow
Khuan-Yu sent a photo.
Could you come to the radio studio around 10, in order to show me how to do a show on air
For sure
Thanks. Just let me know when it is most convenient for you
Iâll make sure you learn how to put it on air for next time
Sounds good
Thanks again for this opportunity

We weren't able to figure out how to do it on air, so we just recorded. If you want to listen before airing it, that might be a good idea. I think it is fine, but if you could just make sure, that would be great
Be really sensitive when discussing sps issues thougb
Sorry this is late but you can broadcast on air if you want
We also might discuss stuff at SPS, like the last LinC day

Rex and I were going to go to the studio tonight around 7 and we were wondering if we could do the show on air. We will probably just go through our news feed and cover any issues that come up, other than those I did yesterday
Khuan-Yu: ó°
perfect
Yep. There was no yelling and it was calm
and your topics look fine just make sure things stay civil and make sure its clear that everythings your opinion not the schools
sounds good
Caleb and I just recorded, and wrote down the correct file number
thanks!
great! will get the files sorted out dw
Just finished up our show, but we are not sure which file it is, either 1001 or 1002, as we wrote on the sheet. Thanks both Rex and I had a blast.
Thanks
should be
Will the radio room be open around 5:45 today
Not yet
Did we get our individual scores
Khuan-Yu: ó°
For sure. Iâll let you know when weâre having our next meeting
Thanks
Youâll be a lawyer and the competition is next weekend
Hi! Are you aware if I will be a lawyer, and if so what the dates of the tournament will be?
Thanks
dont worry about it at all weâll just let you know what happens
I was not aware that I would need to complete until this morning

Hey, I am really sorry to say that I will be unable to get to tonight's meeting, due to an athletic commitment. I understand if this results in replacement. Thanks for the opportunity. If there is anything I can do please let me know
